price: Zar on da svede bogove na nekakvog boga jednog? To je, zaista, nešto veoma čudno!”
arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
